content.heroIntro:
Welcome to SAMIRA BEACH IV, an exceptional new development by MAROQUE in the picturesque pueblo of Pilar de La Horadada, Alicante. This carefully designed project offers 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom bungalows with built sizes ranging from 93-96m², starting from just €285,000. Scheduled for completion on 01-04-2027, SAMIRA BEACH IV represents outstanding value in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable locations, combining modern construction standards with proximity to pristine beaches and championship golf courses.

Located in pueblo, Pilar de La Horadada offers the perfect balance of coastal living and authentic Spanish charm. The development appeals to families, retirees, and investors seeking quality properties at 40% less than comparable Spanish island markets. With an established international community and English widely spoken throughout the area, SAMIRA BEACH IV welcomes buyers from around the world looking for their dream Mediterranean home.

MARQUE's commitment to quality construction is evident throughout SAMIRA BEACH IV, featuring air conditioning pre-installation, fitted kitchens with modern appliances, double glazing, and landscaped gardens. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, holiday retreat, or investment opportunity with strong rental potential, SAMIRA BEACH IV delivers exceptional value and lifestyle benefits that make it a compelling choice for international buyers.

This thriving community has evolved into a preferred destination for international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean living without sacrificing access to world-class amenities. The area benefits from exceptional geography, nestled between pristine Blue Flag beaches and championship golf courses, while maintaining strong connections to major urban centers. Local markets, supermarkets, and healthcare facilities ensure daily needs are easily met, while the vibrant restaurant scene showcases both traditional Spanish cuisine and international options. Pilar de La Horadada offers the perfect blend of relaxation, recreation, and authentic coastal living that defines the best of Costa Blanca.
